metadata.title: Autonymo — AI & Automation Agency
metadata.description: We build AI-powered operating systems for Real Estate, Health Services, and custom business solutions.

nav.newsletterDesc: Get the latest AI insights and product updates.
nav.deepDiveBlogsDesc: Deep dives into AI automation and strategies.
nav.realEstateOSDesc: AI-powered property management, owner capture, and contract automation.
nav.healthServicesOSDesc: Intelligent scheduling, diagnostics, and patient engagement.
nav.customSolutionsDesc: Custom AI implementations tailored to your business needs.

hero.title: AI solutions built for
hero.subtitle: We design, build, and deploy intelligent operating systems for Real Estate, Health Services, and beyond — so your team can focus on what matters most.

industries.label: Industry Solutions
industries.title: Choose your industry.
industries.subtitle: Each OS is a complete AI-powered operating system tailored to your industry's workflows, regulations, and growth drivers.

realEstate.name: Real Estate OS
realEstate.description: A complete operating system for real estate teams. Capture property owners, re-engage cold leads, and automate contracts — all powered by AI.

healthServices.name: Health Services OS
healthServices.description: The intelligent backbone for modern healthcare practices. Automate patient scheduling, AI-assisted diagnostics, and insurance verification in one unified system.

custom.name: Custom Solutions
custom.description: Don't see your industry? We build bespoke AI operating systems for any business. Our consulting team designs custom solutions from the ground up.

capabilities.label: Core Capabilities
capabilities.title: The tools your team actually needs — built to work from day one

automation.title: Automation Agents
automation.description: Automate repetitive workflows and requests across your business. Free your team from manual tasks and make your operations faster, smarter, and more efficient.

voice.title: AI Voice Agent
voice.description: Handle inbound and outbound calls automatically — qualify leads, answer questions, or schedule appointments in multiple languages.

leads.title: Lead Qualification
leads.description: Capture and qualify leads automatically across every channel. Our systems prioritise the best opportunities and sync data directly with your CRM or ERP.

analytics.title: Data & Analytics
analytics.description: Turn your data into decisions. We integrate AI and ML models to extract insights, identify trends, and surface opportunities hidden in your business data.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Faster time-to-value with our enterprise AI solutions and AI agent marketplace.

control.title: Control
control.description: The power of a standardized platform built for the demands of the enterprise.

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: Take control with seamless connection to any AI model, data source, enterprise app, or company infrastructure you need.

depth.title: Deep capabilities
depth.description: An agent platform with the depth to adapt to every interaction, workflow, behavior, and enterprise ecosystem it's deployed into.

experience.title: Proven experience
experience.description: We are an AI-first company that has built its technology and success hand-in-hand with global enterprise customers.

discovery.title: Discovery Call
discovery.description: We learn about your business, map your workflows, and identify the highest-impact areas where AI can drive real results.

build.title: Build & Integrate
build.description: We design, develop, and connect your custom AI agents and automations directly into your existing systems.

launch.title: Launch & Support
launch.description: We test everything end-to-end, go live with your team, and provide ongoing optimisation and a 30-day support period.

cta.title: Ready to automate
cta.subtitle: Join the forward-thinking teams using Autonymo to transform their operations into a competitive advantage.
